subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)
question_en: What is the role of gram panchayat according to 73rd Amendment?
question_hi: 73वैम्बिक समयिक के अध्ययन में ग्राम पंचायत क्या करती है।
B_hi: ग्राम पंचायत के निवड़ी केंद्र उपाधिकार
C_hi: ग्राम पंचायत के कार्यालय के विकास
explanation_en: As per the 73rd Amendment Act, the election of the Gram Panchayat President is carried out at the local level.
explanation_hi: साधारण सभा और निवड़ी केंद्र के माध्यम सभा के निवड़ी केंद्र
explanation_en: Under the 73rd Amendment Act, the election of the Gram Panchayat President falls under local governance.
The 73rd Amendment Act ensures that the election of the Gram Panchayat President is carried out locally.
In the 73rd Amendment Act, the Gram Panchayat President is elected by the local people.
Gram Panchayat President is elected through direct election under the 73rd Amendment Act.
question_en: What is the significance of the 73rd Amendment Act in Indian Panchayati Raj system?
question_hi: भारतीय पंचायत को 73वी सभा माध्यम केंद्र
